## `GetFilePathDisplayMode`

Returns how filepaths\index{Filepaths!display in batch projects} are displayed in the project.

### Syntax {-}

``` {.lua}
FilePathDisplayMode GetFilePathDisplayMode()
```

### Return value {-}

Type: [`FilePathDisplayMode`](#filepathdisplaymode)

How filepaths are being displayed in lists.
